item.title: Dask: Parallelising file downloads
item.description: Before a recent meetup talk that I did showing how to do analytics on your laptop with ClickHouse Local at Aiven’s Open Source Data Infrastructure Meetup, I needed to download a bunch of Parquet files from Hugging Face’s midjourney-messages dataset. I alternate between using wget/curl or a Python script to do this type of work. This time I used Python’s requests library and I had the following script which downloads the Parquet files that I haven’t already downloaded.
